quality of service what is quality of service in kubernetes there are three types of
quality of service guaranteed burstable and best
effort what happens in kubernetes is when you when so many pods are running
right when new requests come in to create new
pods if you the kubernetes will look at okay who who I can kick out so that I
can accommodate the new guy and the kick out thing how kubernetes decide who to

kicked out are if they are classified as best effort the second are burstable the
last one to be kicked out are guaranteed so how can you make sure your pods are
guaranteed because you don't want when you're running automation you don't want your pods to be kicked out and your
automation fails or become unreliable so basically if you want your parts to be
uh guaranteed quality of service when you say when you add your request for

maximum you can go for and those two should be exactly same if you set it
then kubernetes will interpret it as okay this guy I'm looking at request and
